title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
TOSY Flying Disc — The Ultimate Light-Up Disc for Day or Night Play

Meet the TOSY Flying Disc, a professional-standard 175-gram disc engineered for long, straight, and precise flights—and built to light up your game like nothing else.

Key features:
- Ultra-bright LEDs: 36 high-performance LEDs that are up to 100x brighter than typical light-up discs, with 16 million color RGB options to customize your glow.
- Smart modes and sensors: Adjustable brightness levels, timer mode, and motion sensors that automatically light up when you throw for seamless, energy-smart fun.
- Fast rechargeable power: Fully recharges in about 30 minutes. Play up to a thousand throws or a full 90-minute match on a single charge. Includes a USB Type-C to C cable (charger not included).
- Pro-grade performance: 175 g weight and professional ultimate compliance for reliable stability, control, and comfortable grip—ideal for casual tosses, serious matches, and freestyle tricks.
- Built for every game: Perfect for night play, ultimate practice, and backyard classics like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes.
- Rugged and ready: Highly durable and waterproof for all-weather play.

Why you’ll love it:
- Brilliant visibility after dark without sacrificing flight quality.
- Smart, automatic lighting that adapts to your play.
- Quick charge, long runtime, and pro-level consistency.
- A true game-changer disc that turns any session into a show.

What’s in the box:
- TOSY Flying Disc (175 g)
- USB Type-C to C charging cable
- Quick start guide

Note: Wall charger not included.
